p: Here, we show that the approved thrombopoietin receptor agonist eltrombopag exerts anti-HCMV effects in various cell types infected with a range of different virus strains and clinical isolates, including drug-resistant ones. The observed IC 50 values ranged from 99 nM to 4331 nM, which is in the range of therapeutic plasma concentrations that have been reported to exceed 45 ÂµM [ 25, 26]. Eltrombopag also synergistically increased the activity of the approved anti-HCMV drug ganciclovir.
